snippet: An arbitrator will decide in the next two weeks whether to grant so-called Bird rights to Jeremy Lin and three other N.B.A. players.
abstract: An arbitrator will decide in the next two weeks whether to grant so-called Bird rights to New York Knicks guard Jeremy Lin and three other NBA players, in a case that could have a profound effect on the Knicks roster.
lead_paragraph: An arbitrator will decide in the next two weeks whether to grant so-called Bird rights to Jeremy Lin and three other N.B.A. players.

headline.seo: Hearing Held on Lin’s Contract Status
headline.main: Hearing Held on Lin’s Contract Status
